com.software.reuze

Interface mpt_InferenceBackwardStep

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    mpt_i_InferenceForwardBackward
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    mp_HMMInferenceForwardBackward, mp_HMMInferenceForwardBackwardConstantSpace, mpt_InferenceForwardBackward

    public interface mpt_InferenceBackwardStep
    The BACKWARD operator
     bk+1:t = P(ek+1:t | Xk)
    is defined by Equation (15.9).
     P(ek+1:t | Xk) 
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1:t | Xk, xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk) (conditioning on Xk+1)
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1:t | xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk) (by conditional independence)
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1, ek+2:t | xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk)
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1 | xk+1)P(ek+2:t | xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk)
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator backward(mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator b_kp2t, List<mp_PropositionTermOpsAssignment> e_kp1t)
      The BACKWARD operator

    • Method Detail

      • backward

        mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator backward(mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator b_kp2t,
                                            List<mp_PropositionTermOpsAssignment> e_kp1t)
        The BACKWARD operator
         bk+1:t = P(ek+1:t | Xk)
        is defined by Equation (15.9).
         P(ek+1:t | Xk) 
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1:t | Xk, xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk) (conditioning on Xk+1)
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1:t | xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk) (by conditional independence)
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1, ek+2:t | xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk)
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1 | xk+1)P(ek+2:t | xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk)
        Parameters:
        b_kp2t - bk+2:t
        e_kp1t - ek+1:t
        Returns:
        bk+1:t
